      • FLAG_FREQUENCIES

        public static final int FLAG_FREQUENCIES
        Flag to pass to IndexField.get(Object, int) if you require frequencies in the returned IndexFieldTerm. Frequencies might be returned anyway for some lucene codecs even if this flag is no set.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
